metadata.title: CVE-2023-46928 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: GPAC 2.3-DEV-rev605-gfc9e29089-master contains a SEGV in gpac/MP4Box ingf_media_change_pl /afltest/gpac/src/media_tools/isom_tools.c:3293:42.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
